set.description: Turns the vibration on or off. Cancels a running pattern.

params.name: time
params.description: The time in ms to vibrate for. 0 = forever.

turnOff.description: Turns the vibration off, and cancels any running pattern.

toggle.description: Toggles the vibration state. If in a pattern, cancels the pattern first.

startPattern.description: Starts a vibration pattern. Cancels any existing running pattern.

params.name: repeat
params.description: The number of times to play this pattern. 0 = forever.

oneOf.description: Indicated a vibration pattern is currently being played
